Operated nightly since 1908

Arrive before sunrise, accompanied by piano and brass.

Nine Lives Air offers overnight passage between old harbor cities and mountain capitals, with live jazz in every cabin and attentive service from our heritage crew. Departures are quiet, precise, and soft-footed.

Reserve a Seat
Midnight Horn Line, Ghost Light Waltz, Silk Runway Blues, and Final Approach in C Minor.

Scheduled Night Routes

Every route includes in-cabin quartet service from pushback to touchdown. Soft applause encouraged.

  • Riga Moon Pier → Lisbon Tide Terminal 22:40 departure · Candlelit supper · Tenor sax through cloud break
  • Helsinki Clocktower → Tangier South Hangar 23:15 departure · Night tea cart · Upright bass in aisle two
  • Naples East Gate → Reykjavík Lantern Field 00:05 departure · Quiet reading cabin · Trumpet feature after midnight

Travel Notes

Do musicians play for the entire flight?

Yes. Sets are arranged in gentle movements, with a short interlude during meal service.

Can I request a song?

Requests are welcomed before departure. Our salon conductor confirms availability at boarding.

Who assists during overnight service?

Our longstanding cabin staff manages boarding, dining, and comfort rounds in full uniform.
